TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DrawItemEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `DrawItem`事件引发由所有者描述控件，如和控件。The `DrawItem` event is raised by owner draw controls, such as the and controls. 它包含要绘制的指定的项，包括项索引的用户所需的所有信息，和上完成绘图。It contains all the information that is needed for the user to paint the specified item, including the item index, the , and the on which the drawing should be done. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建所有者绘制项。The following example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn items. 该代码使用属性指定绘制的项固定大小并要执行到每个项的绘制事件。The code uses the property to specify that the items drawn are fixed sized and the event to perform the drawing of each item into the . 该示例代码使用的属性和方法的类作为参数传递给要绘制项的事件处理程序。The example code uses the properties and methods of the class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items. 此示例假定控件名为`listBox1`已添加到窗体，由示例代码中定义的事件处理程序处理事件。This example assumes that a control that is named `listBox1` has been added to a form and that the event is handled by the event handler defined in the example code. 该示例还假定已将项添加到包括按该顺序的"Apple"、"橙色"和"Plum"文本。The example also assumes that items have been added to the with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum" in that order. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果项的状态是，则设置为。If the item's state is , the is set to . 如果项的状态不是，则属性设置为。If the item's state is not , the property is set to . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表有助于您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ListBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type that is named `ListBox1`. 请确保事件处理程序与关联事件。Then make sure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建所有者绘制项。The following example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn items. 该代码使用属性指定绘制的项固定大小并要执行到每个项的绘制事件。The code uses the property to specify that the items drawn are fixed sized and the event to perform the drawing of each item into the . 该示例代码使用的属性和方法的类作为参数传递给要绘制项的事件处理程序。The example code uses the properties and methods of the class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items. 此示例假定控件名为`listBox1`已添加到窗体，由示例代码中定义的事件处理程序处理事件。This example assumes that a control that is named `listBox1` has been added to a form and that the event is handled by the event handler defined in the example code. 该示例还假定已将项添加到包括按该顺序的"Apple"、"橙色"和"Plum"文本。The example also assumes that items have been added to the with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum" in that order.
